participant_1.background:
I am currently a stay at home mom while my husband is the sole provider.
I have two children.
I am thirty years old.
We have two pets as well.

participant_2.background:
I work as a construction worker during the summers.
My parents are divorced.
I am a college student.
My favourite food is ice cream.
I love to travel.

content.text: Hi, I'm (user 1's name). What's your name?
Hi, I'm (user 2's name). Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you do for a living?
I'm a college student. I'm working as a construction worker during the summers.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a stay at home mom with two kids.
That sounds like a lot of work! How do you manage it?
It's definitely challenging, but it's also very rewarding. I love spending time with my kids and watching them grow up.
I can imagine! I love kids too. I'm hoping to have some of my own someday.
That would be great! Kids are a lot of fun, but they're also a lot of work.
I know, but I'm sure it would be worth it.
It definitely is.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go out with my friends, read, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go out with my friends, travel, and play sports.
I love to travel too! I've been to a few different countries, but I'd love to see more.
Me too! I've been to a few countries as well, but I'd love to see more of the world.
I think it's so important to experience new things and meet new people.
I agree! It's a great way to learn and grow as a person.
So, where have you been?
I've been to Canada, Mexico, and the United States.
Nice! I've been to Canada and Mexico too. I'd love to go to the United States someday.
It's a great place to visit! There's so much to see and do.
I'm sure it is. I'll have to put it on my list of places to go.
You definitely should!
